googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Sara England
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Fast, friendly and good priced. Recommend.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Practical Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Dennis Dethloff
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Practical Plumbing replaced my hot water heater , they showed up promptly did a great job at a fair price ! I would definitely use there services again . I highly recommend them .
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Practical Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Stephanie Whitworth
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Very respectful young men. Did a great job working on my plumbing and found the issue. They cleaned behind themselves and worked with us on pricing. I will continue to do business with them and refer them to other!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Practical Plumbing

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Hulene Sherer

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Christy Lombardo

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about Practical Plumbing in Hayden, Alabama, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**: While the sources do not provide specific details on the licensing status of Practical Plumbing, it is required by law in Alabama for plumbing businesses to be registered and have a Principal Master for each trade. However, there is no explicit mention of Practical Plumbing's compliance with these regulations in the available sources[5].
- **Physical Location and Service Areas**: The business is located at 2097 Clevet Springs Rd, Hayden, AL 35079. The service areas are not explicitly stated, but it is implied to serve the local region around Hayden, AL[3].
- **Hours and Payment Methods**: Practical Plumbing operates 24/7, as indicated by their schedule showing they are open from 12:00 a.m. to Midnight every day. There is no specific information on payment methods[3].
- **Years in Operation**: The business started on February 1, 2024, making it less than a year old as of the current date[1].

## Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**: Practical Plumbing tackles both residential and commercial plumbing needs, including new construction projects and existing system repairs. They also perform tasks such as replacing hot water heaters[3].
- **Service Areas Covered**: While not explicitly stated, it is inferred that they serve the local area around Hayden, AL.
- **Emergency Service Availability**: There is no specific mention of emergency service availability, but their 24/7 operation suggests they may be available for emergency services.
- **Any Listed Prices or Rates**: There is no detailed pricing information available in the sources. However, customers have mentioned that the prices are "fair" and "good priced"[3].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**: Customers have praised the business for being "very respectful," doing a "great job," and being "punctual" and "responsive." Specific examples include replacing a hot water heater promptly and at a fair price, and cleaning up after themselves[3].
- **BBB Rating and Status**: Practical Plumbing is not BBB accredited and has a BBB rating of A-, primarily due to the length of time the business has been operating (less than a year)[1].
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**: Themes include respectfulness, punctuality, responsiveness, high-quality work, and fair pricing[3].
- **Response to Reviews**: There is no information available on how the business responds to reviews, as the profile has not been claimed by the business owner or representative[3].

## Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**: There is no specific information available about the owner or management of Practical Plumbing. The business is listed as a partnership[1].
- **Staff Qualifications**: The sources do not provide detailed information on the staff's qualifications or professional certifications. However, customers have praised the staff for their high-quality work and professionalism[3].
- **Professional Certifications**: There is no explicit mention of any professional certifications held by the staff or the business. Compliance with Alabama's licensing requirements would typically involve having certified professionals, but this is not confirmed in the available sources[5].
aboutUs: Practical Plumbing is a locally owned and operated plumbing company serving the Hayden, Alabama area. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in both residential and commercial plumbing services, from new construction projects to repairs and maintenance. We take pride in our expertise, attention to detail, and commitment to delivering top-notch solutions for all your plumbing needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the convenience and peace of mind that comes with our 24/7 availability and prompt, reliable service.
sellingPoints: Our team of highly trained and certified plumbers has the expertise to handle any plumbing challenge, from complex installations to emergency repairs.
We prioritize customer satisfaction by providing transparent communication, fair pricing, and meticulous attention to detail on every job.
As a local business, we understand the unique needs of our community and are dedicated to delivering personalized solutions tailored to your specific requirements.
